bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Free GST Billing , Inventory Management and ONDC store for your shop. Works on any device. Contact +917388974291 to bring your shop on ONDC.

descriptor.name: Britannia 50-50 Sweet And Salty Biscuits
descriptor.long_desc: Britannia 50-50 Sweet & Salty Biscuits are prepared with the goodness of two completely distinct flavours blended together. Britannia biscuits, cookies, cakes and rusk are a perfect companion for your tea. Believing in delivering fresh and healthy products, Britannia India manufactures some of India's favourite brands like Good Day, Tiger, NutriChoice, Bourbon, Milk Bikis and Marie Gold.

descriptor.name: Mountain dew
descriptor.long_desc: Mountain Dew exhilarates like no other because of its active, high-energy, extreme citrus taste. The idea of daring, challenges, a can-do attitude, adventure and exhilaration are deeply entrenched in its brand DNA. Mountain Dew has always celebrated the bold, adventurous and rebellious spirit of youth. A powerful combo of an edgy citrus taste and an energy boost

descriptor.name: Coke 250 ml
descriptor.long_desc: Coca-Cola Zero Sugar, PET Bottle, is the perfect companion for snacks and meals. Coca-Cola Zero Sugar is enough to give you the required amount of energy and zeal if you're struggling with laziness and feeling tired. Coca-Cola Zero Sugar is said to be helpful in relieving nausea. Take this Pet Bottle, with you on all your trips so that it can come in handy when struggling with motion sickness. This Coca-Cola Bottle has zero added sugar making sure you enjoy your favourite drink guilt-free. The trademark and distinctive taste of Coke remain intact in this healthier alternative. Coca-Cola Zero Sugar can be used as a chilled beverage with meals, as a mixer for booze or even added to cocktails or mocktails. Explore a wide range of Coca Cola soft drinks only on Big Basket.

descriptor.name: Minerals Water
descriptor.long_desc: Pure, unprocessed, and untouched, Himalayan Natural Mineral Water originates in the upper reaches of the Himalayan mountains just for you. Every drop of this pure and natural drinking water travels through layers of rock, sand, and silt for around 20 years and is then packed for you to drink. It is naturally enriched with minerals such as magnesium, sodium, calcium, etc. and has the perfect pH balance. HimalayanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unique mineral composition gives it a characteristic taste and is packaged in a premium, instantly recognizable bottle. This makes it a great meal accompaniment and instantly elevates the dining experience. People who love the finer things in life do not just enjoy Himalayan with their meals at fine restaurants, but also make it their brand of choice at home. It is one of the most consumed natural mineral water in the finest homes across the country. Experience the taste of Raw, Rare, Remarkable with Himalayan.

descriptor.name: Nimbooz
descriptor.long_desc: Enjoy this refreshing tangy drink and quench your thirst. 7UP Nimbooz is tangier and bubblier than the other 7UPs. Experience a burst of refreshing taste with each sip. Due to its amazing taste this refreshing drink has become the main player in the juice-based drinks category. Nimbooz is as good as homemade refreshing nimbu pani, and has the goodness of real lemons which are rich in vitamin C and help your immune system to stay strong. On summer days, Nimbooz is sure to keep you hydrated and rejuvenated all day long while helping you beat the summer heat.

descriptor.name: Mixed Fruit Juice
descriptor.long_desc: Real Fruit Power Mixed Fruit Juice blends the finest qualities of various fruits, delivering a distinctive tangy-sweet flavour that appeals to children. It's a preferred choice for its invigorating taste, especially for kids who may not prefer fruit salads or sliced fruits. With a blend of nine nutritious fruitsâ€”Passion Fruit, Apricot, Mango, Banana, Pineapple, Guava, Orange, Apple, and Limeâ€”each serving of Real Mixed Fruit offers a wholesome mix of nutrition and refreshment. This unique combination has made Real Mixed Fruit a popular option nationwide, perfect for enjoying on its own or as a base for delightful summer beverages like mixed fruit punch.
